## CO2 Verbrauch

```{r,cache=T,eval=Ex4}
link <- "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_countries_by_carbon_dioxide_emissions_per_capita"
link_data <- read_html(link)
doc <- htmlParse(link_data)
tab <- readHTMLTable(doc)
```


```{r,eval=Ex4}
str(tab)
```
